posts.post_content:
1887 N172 Old Judge Crane. Please note: The right border has a bowed cut that narrows toward the top right corner and the tone between his head and throwing arm is lighter than the tone on the rest of the card-$100.00 (sold)

The card was previously in a SGC 30 Good 2 case. The previous owner preferred keeping his cards in binders and top loaders. A scan of the card in the SGC holder is attached.

S/h is an additional $6.95 (certified mail). If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal gift/Friends and Family.
[url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url]
If bigfish doesn't take it, I'll take it. 2nd in line please.
